 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּךְ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִיךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==hedge, or fence about, shut in== (\|\| form of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוךְ‎</span> probably not connected with Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thorns***; possibly compare Syr, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***finish***, Pa\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***finish, conclude, comprehend***, and Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***close, close up, stop, stop up, lock up*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1386</sup>); — 

**Qal** (al. **Hiph\`il**, but compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּךְ‎</span>) ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַ֫יָּסֶךְ אֱלוֺהַּ בַּעֲדוֺ‎</span> [[Job.3.23|Job 3:23]], with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instrumental <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫סֶךְ בִּדְלָתַיִם יָ֑ם‎</span> [[Job.38.8|Job 38:8]] ***and (who) shut in the sea with doors ?*** ([[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמִי סָךְ‎</span>, [[BDB#Me|Me]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִי סָךְ‎</span>). 



 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==overshadow, screen, cover== (\|\| √ to I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂכך‎</span> (which is probably original, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, and [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>90</sup>); Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵסֵיךְ‎</span> ***cover***, and perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִכֵּךְ‎</span> ***roof over***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** only 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַכֹּ֫תָ‎</span> [[Exod.40.3|Exod 40:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַכֹּ֫תָה‎</span> [[Lam.3.43|Lam 3:43]]; [[Lam.3.44|Lam 3:44]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַכּ֫וֺתָה‎</span> [[Ps.140.8|Ps 140:8]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּסֹ֫כּוּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.7|1Kgs 8:7]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְסֻכֻּ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Job.40.22|Job 40:22]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוֺכֵךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.28.14|Ezek 28:14]]; [[Ezek.28.16|Ezek 28:16]], plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹכֲבִים‎</span> [[Exod.25.20|Exod 25:20]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***screen, cover***, usually co. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> of thing covered, [[1Kgs.8.7|1Kgs 8:7]]; [[1Chr.28.18|1Chr 28:18]] + accusative of covering [[Exod.40.3|Exod 40:3]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of covering [[Exod.25.20|Exod 25:20]]; [[Exod.37.9|Exod 37:9]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> of thing covered [[Ps.140.8|Ps 140:8]] so (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instrumental) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּעָנָן לָךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Lam.3.44|Lam 3:44]] ***thou hast screened thyself with the clouds***; with accusative [[Job.40.22|Job 40:22]] ***lotus-trees, as its shade, screen it***; absolute [[Ezek.28.14|Ezek 28:14]]; [[Ezek.28.16|Ezek 28:16]] (difficult, text probably corrupt, [[BDB#Co|Co]] Toy strike out as gloss). 

**2.** reflexive ***cover oneself*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָאַף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Lam.3.43|Lam 3:43]] ***thou hast covered*** (clothed, panoplied) ***thyself with anger*** (si vera lectio; compare v[[Lam.3.44|Lam 3:44]] ***above***.). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect***. 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָ֫סֶךְ לָךְ‎</span> [[Ps.91.4|Ps 91:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫סֶךְ‎</span> [[Exod.40.1|Exod 40:1]] + 2 t.; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּסֵךְ‎</span> [[Ps.5.12|Ps 5:12]] ***Infinitive construct***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָסֵךְ‎</span> [[1Sam.24.4|1Sam 24:4]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵסִיךְ‎</span> [[Judg.3.24|Judg 3:24]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67v»§ 67v</sup>); — ***screen, cover***, 

**1.** specifically with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתרַֿגְלָיו‎</span>, i.e. with long garments, euphemism for evacuating the bowels, from posture assumed, so infinitive [[Judg.3.24|Judg 3:24]], participle [[1Sam.24.4|1Sam 24:4]] (compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵסֵיךְ‎</span>, and see [[BDB#GFM|GFM]], [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]). 

**2.** elsewhere Imperfect, as **Qal** (explained as Qal [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xliii (1889), 178</sup>), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> [[Exod.40.21|Exod 40:21]], of protection [[Ps.5.12|Ps 5:12]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instrumental [[Ps.91.4|Ps 91:4]] (of protection). **Pilpel** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִכְסֵךְ‎</span>, denominative, see below **IV.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂבך‎</span>. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==weave together== (\|\| form of II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂבַךְ‎</span>; Late Hebrew Hiph\`il <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵסֵיךְ‎</span> ***weave***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּבָּה‎</span>, ***booth***,); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּסֻכֵּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.139.13|Ps 139:13]] ***thou didst weave me together*** in my mother's womb. 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹכֵךְ‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==protector==; — technical term of structure shielding stormers of city (Latin <abbr title="transliteration"><u>testudo</u></abbr>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסּ‎</span> [[Nah.2.6|Nah 2:6]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">τὰς</span> <span class="bdbLangGreek">προφνλακὰς</span> <span class="bdbLangGreek">αὐτῶν</span>. 

 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==cover, lay over==, so as to screen (compare \|\| √ I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סכן‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשַׂכֹּתִי כַפִּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלֶיךָ‎</span> [[Exod.33.22|Exod 33:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]). 



<small>Also see: [[H7918]]</small>

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==weave== (compare \|\| √ II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סכך‎</span>); **Po\`lel** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשׂכְכֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.10.11|Job 10:11]] with bones and sinews ***thou weavest me together.***. 

<small>Also see: [[H7753]]</small>

 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂכך‎</span> (√ of following; compare I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוך‎</span>. II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוך‎</span>). 

 IV. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכַךְ‎</span>] **Pilpel** ==prick or spur on== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pierce*** (perhaps denominative from) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thorn***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***point*** of spear, etc.; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thorn***); — ***prick*** or ***spur on***, accusative of person: ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסִכְסַכְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Isa.19.2|Isa 19:2]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> against); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְסַכְסֵךְ‎</span> [[Isa.9.10|Isa 9:10]].
